venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
This isn't the kind of movie I'd normally see, but the trailer looks interesting and I haven't scheduled a romance movie for a while ... if ever. So let's meetup for Letters to Juliet.

So far, we have 1 Yes (me) and 2 Maybe RSVPs. If no one else RSVPs Yes, then I'll cancel the meetup.

I originally scheduled this for Solomon Pond Mall, but I had a request to move it closer to Worcester. According to moviefone.com, Letters to Juliet is not showing at Showcase this weekend, so I changed the venue to Blackstone Valley Cinema.

The movie starts at 6:50 on Friday night. Let's aim to meet in the lobby at Blackstone Valley Cinema in Millbury at 6:20 PM. As usual, I'm willing to meet people for eats after the film.

Sophie (Amanda Seyfried) finds a Letter to Juliet (the star-crossed lover of Romeo) while vacationing in Italy. She sets out to reunite the pair of elderly lovers in the letter.

Here's the link to the movie info at IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/t...

- David Bainbridge

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Letters to Juliet - meet at 6:20 at Blackstone Valley Cinema
